title: Riot Points
body:
Hi! I've been trying to buy some riotpoints in the last few days, but I get a message saying: 
"ERROR You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Please wait 24 hours and try again later."
last time i tried was about 30 hours ago, and I still get this message. 
Does anyone know what the problem might be, and how to fix it?

replies.body: We'd like to help out with this, but not on the boards due to the nature of sensitive account information.  Reach out to us by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll respond as soon as possible!  We'll look into this for you and find some options best for you.  Thanks for your patience!
